name: PetraX
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 84: Bubbles

Summary:

Place bubbles to bounce PetraX the stone on its journey to the surface, in this physics based plattformer

Inscructions:

Mouse:  Place bubbles; The longer the button being pressed the bigger and stronger the bubble.    Hit enemies while having high velocities to destroy them.

E: restart

Escape: quit
